Text: Thanx for the upload but I was wondering, The Special Edition is supposed to be 171min (2 hours and 51 min) and the info says it's 2 hours and 18 min.   So, which one is wrong?  Is it not the Special Edition or is it the 2:18 a miss print? Later days.
I only have one question: Is this the UK version without the rat breathing the liquid? Yes, those 30 seconds are important to me.
looks good in the specs but why 3 separate files?

@frijolito
Yes it has the water breathing rat.
The 2:18 duration in the description is a misprint. This is actually the loooong 3 hour special edition. And indeed with the water breathing rat. Quality looks great to me.
